name: database-operations-mcp
description: Universal Database Operations MCP - SQL, NoSQL, and Vector database management with Windows Registry support

prompts.name: query_database_prompt
prompts.description: Execute a query on a database
prompts.text: Run this SQL query on the {database_name} database: {query}

prompts.name: create_database_prompt
prompts.text: Create a new database named {database_name} with the following schema: {schema_definition}

prompts.name: backup_database_prompt
prompts.text: Create a backup of the {database_name} database

prompts.name: list_tables_prompt
prompts.description: List all tables in a database
prompts.text: List all tables in the {database_name} database

prompts.name: describe_table_prompt
prompts.description: Describe the structure of a table
prompts.text: Show the structure of the {table_name} table in the {database_name} database

prompts.name: optimize_database_prompt
prompts.text: Optimize the performance of the {database_name} database

prompts.name: export_data_prompt
prompts.text: Export data from the {database_name} database to {output_file} with format {format}

prompts.name: import_data_prompt
prompts.text: Import data from {input_file} into the {database_name} database with format {format}
